page.title: 07Lifestyles around Raveley
page.content: The grid covers a rural area containing 3 small villages, Little Raveley and Great Raveley are farming hamlets and social life centres around the farms. Wistow has grown with new housing developments in recent years and residents commute to neighbouring towns for employment and shopping. It has a church and a public house and some social life centres around these. There is also a post office cum village store where everyday needs can be obtained. Able village people care for their less able neighbours and help with visits to doctors and dentists. Most mothers stay at home with their children until they reach school age. There is no ethnic population, although a few American service personnel live in the area.
